alert.note: Alert for White Pine (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 5:06PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Nevada, including the following county, White Pine. * WHEN...Until 815 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water is possible in low areas including poorly drained sections of roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 506 PM PDT, the public reported heavy rain in 53 due to thunderstorms. This will cause small stream flooding. Between 0.3 and 0.7 inches of rain have fallen. - Highway 50 west of Ruth is experience flooding over the roadway. Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.1 inches are expected over the area. Radar is indicating that rainfall over this area is decreasing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ruth. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
